# KoefoedR

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of KoefoedR is to collect various functions and datasets commonly used.

## Installation

You can install the development version of KoefoedR from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("koefoeden/KoefoedR")
```
